education.relevantCoursework: Intro to Computer Science, Data Structures, Discrete Structures 1 & 2, Computer Architecture, Intro to Artificial Intelligence, Software Methodology, Imaging and Multimedia, Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms, Data Management
education.description: My relevant classwork includes: Intro to Computer Science, Data Structures, Discrete Structures 1 & 2, Computer Architecture, Intro to Artificial Intelligence, Software Methodology, Imaging and Multimedia, Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms, Data Management. I was also a member of the Rutgers Mobile App Development Club, Rutgers Creation of Games Society, Rutgers Association of Punjabis Club, and National Society of Leadership and Success.

experience.title: Developer | Owner
experience.description: I created Priorityze with a vision of enhancing productivity, both for myself and others. Priorityze, available on the Apple App Store and Google Play Store, empowers users to organize and manage all their tasks with their own unique preferences. This innovative app, developed using React Native, seamlessly synchronizes tasks, subtasks, lists, and categories across multiple devices. What sets Priorityze apart is its integration of Artificial Intelligence, allowing for the rapid generation of intricate tasks with just a prompt. I also spearheaded a multi-platform marketing campaign, utilizing social media platforms such as Instagram and TikTok, to effectively promote the app to users around the world.

experience.title: VDC Engineer Intern - VDC Engineer
experience.description: As an engineer, I have leveraged my technical expertise to create a more accurate representation of real-world conditions through the generation of multiple 3D models and laser scanning. In addition to this, I continue to oversee and meticulously quality-control various design and subcontractor models, streamlining the installation process. My responsibilities also included the production of multiple floor plan submittals, specifically for deck penetrations, ceiling penetrations, and reflected ceiling plans (RCPs).

experience.title: Shift Manager
experience.description: Taste of India 2 is an Indian restaurant in Staten Island, New York. I assisted in maintaining an online presence by updating the backend and frontend of the website regularly. I managed various types of orders including online, dine-in, and takeout. I also settled all transactions at the end of each switch

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Hill West is an industry-leading architectural firm known for creating beautiful high-rise towers in New York City. As an intern I contributed to keeping project submittals organized. I constructed a highly detailed 3d model of the exterior of a future project to present to investors. I also aided architects in the design of an apartment floor plan. I gained valuable knowledge such as the design process of high rise buildings as well as technical skills such as learning AutoCAD and Sketchup.

skills.name: App Development
skills.description: I have utilized React Native and Node JS to successfully develop and deploy an app that assists thousands of people to be more productive.

skills.name: UI/UX/Web Design & Development
skills.description: I have experience with web design through Adobe XD and Adobe Photoshop. Additionally, I have developed websites using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. I have also created websites utilizing React.JS as well.

skills.name: Backend Development
skills.description: I have utilized Node.JS and MySQL to create a custom backend for Priorityze. The backend is used to synchronize data across multiple devices, safely store user data using OAuth, and call multiple APIs to help users create more intricate tasks.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: I have knowledge of how to use Java since I have been using it frequently for college projects since Fall 2020.

skills.name: 3D Modeling & Construction Coordination
skills.description: I can model objects such as houses, piping, and buildings using Sketchup, Rhino, and AutoCAD. I learned these programs through my internship at Hill West Architects. I learned the process of construction coordination by using Revizto through my internship at Whiting Turner.

skills.name: Social Media Marketing
skills.description: I have experience with social media marketing using both Facebook and Instagram. I was able to assist Taste of India 2, which is my current part time job, in connecting and gaining more customers through the use of social media.

skills.name: Artificial Intelligence
skills.description: I am learning artificial intelligence through the use of Python and Node JS.

skills.name: Game Development
skills.description: I am currently in the process of learning C# for game development in the Unity Engine.
